definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
garment/jacket with open slits in place of sleeves

sentences.english: Jane worked out a beautiful design for a sweater.
sentences.chinese: 簡設計出一種漂亮的運動衫。

sentences.english: They're a bit foxed by the colours of the riders' jerseys and hats.
sentences.chinese: 自行車手運動衫和帽子的顏色讓他們有點兒困惑。

sentences.english: Fortunately my friend had a sweater, and I tied it around my waist.
sentences.chinese: 幸運的是我朋友有一件厚運動衫，我把它纏在了腰上。

sentences.english: Our T-shirt design contest runs through April 17.
sentences.chinese: 運動衫設計比賽將於四月十七日截止。

sentences.english: I wear a hooded sweatshirt when I go running in the moring.
sentences.chinese: 晨跑的時候喜歡穿有帽子的運動衫。

sentences.english: At home, she favors University of Michigan sweatshirts.
sentences.chinese: 在家裏，她喜歡穿着密歇根大學的運動衫。

sentences.english: She used to slop around all day in old jeans and sweatshirts.
sentences.chinese: 以前，她時常整天穿着舊牛仔褲和運動衫閒逛。

sentences.english: She's respectably dressed in jeans and sweatshirt.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着牛仔褲和運動衫，非常得體。

sentences.english: That brand-new red Bulls sweat suit bled onto the other clothes.
sentences.chinese: 那件全新的紅色公牛隊運動衫染壞了其他的衣服。

sentences.english: People usually bring sweaters to the office because of this.
sentences.chinese: 因此人們通常帶厚運動衫到辦公室。

sentences.english: It took several hours with a jackhammer, but the jersey was found.
sentences.chinese: 用手提鑽花了幾個小時最終找到了那件運動衫。

sentences.english: I found her a warm sweatshirt and helped her pull it on.
sentences.chinese: 我趕快給她找了一件厚實的運動衫，幫她穿上。

sentences.english: Sweatshirts and sweaters with a turtleneck and a lighter jacket are a good option.
sentences.chinese: 圓領運動衫和毛線衫，以及輕型夾克都是不錯的選擇。

sentences.english: Instead, he had the rings pinned inside his cycling jersey.
sentences.chinese: 然而他卻從自行車運動衫裏抽出了戒指。

sentences.english: Taylor rose and straightened his yellow and blue striped sweater.
sentences.chinese: 拉平他那件黃藍兩色帶條紋的運動衫。

sentences.english: I wore jeans and sweatshirts and had long hair and a mustache. I falt free.
sentences.chinese: 我穿牛仔褲和運動衫，我有長長的頭髮和鬍子。

definition: to take off costume and makeup/bottom garment (trousers etc)
